artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Sanoya Kihei
catalogue_raissonne: S0530-002.1-3; Marks, Genji's World in Japanese Woodblock Prints (2012), no. G315-02
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: triptych; a (left): little girl at right, wearing a kimono with blue patterning and red field with multicolored flowers, holding a beaded bell with a windchime, decorated with floral motifs; girl hands windchime to woman in a grey kimono with red flowers and green leaves, standing on a yellow stool; b (center): seated woman wearing a purple kimono with blue flowers and green leaves, holding one end of an orange banner with green birds and green and red flowers; candle on tall black and white pedestal at right; c (right): orange banner extends into this panel, with opposite end behind a seated man wearing a blue kimono with stylized orange and blue flowers across the middle; man holds a brush and paper; woman with heavy face behind man, wearing purple and blue striped kimono and holding a black box with yellow flowers; seascape with moon at left behind figures; text at lower right corners of a and c and at bottom center of b
dimension: 14 × 9 3/4 in. (35.5 × 24.77 cm) (image, sheet, vertical ōban, each)
markings: red artist\'s toshidama seal, censor seals: {Muramatsu} | {Fukushima} | publisher\'s seal: {Sanoki}
medium: Woodblock prints (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Copied Pictures of Graceful Eastern Figures (Yasa sugata azuma no utsushi-e やさ姿吾妻野うつし絵)
signed: Right: 一陽齋豊國画 {Ichiyōsai Toyokuni ga} | center:  國貞舎豊國画 {Kokuteisha Toyokuni ga} | left: 香蝶楼豊國画 {Kōchōrō Toyokuni ga}
title: Autumn
